channel.title: Play now/run game problem
channel.description:
Hello,
i got an serius problem, when im trying to start the client then cmd doesn't starts or says pads is not found, what do i need to do about this? Thank you very much for you're comment.For the person who helps me il give him 15 dollar through paypal.
